ygData.subject: Re: [EQ_Necromancer] Re: Particle Weapon for Necro's
ygData.msgSnippet: Actually occasioanlly clerics in hate resist lifetap it s weird but I can get a lifetap on once in awhile. Special mobs have the chanch to resist it or resist
ygData.messageBody:
Actually occasioanlly clerics in hate resist lifetap it's weird but I can
get a lifetap on once in awhile. Special mobs have the chanch to resist it
or resist it all the time it's just the downside to a generally unresistable
spell.

naeeldar

-----Original Message-----
From: Mark Rafn <dagon@...>
To: EQ_Necromancer@egroups.com <EQ_Necromancer@egroups.com>
Date: Thursday, September 28, 2000 1:43 PM
Subject: Re: [EQ_Necromancer] Re: Particle Weapon for Necro's


>
>> faelen@... writes:
>> << Ummmm.... Lifetap is unresistable. Atleast I have NEVER had it
>> resisted. Check that... the EXG in Sol A is the only thing to ever
>> resist my Lifetap's >>
>
>On Thu, 28 Sep 2000 ligge@... wrote:
>> It is resistable - they made it so about 9 months ago - its a level cap.
>
>The word "resist" can have different meanings.
>
>Lifetap is not resistable in that the normal magic resistance of a critter
>is ignored. You'll never get a resist, cast again and have it stick.
>
>Lifetap IS resistable in that there are some critters you can't cast it
>on. Anything over 6 levels higher than you, or totally immune to magic,
>and perhaps some that are immune to lifetap and not other magic.
>--
>Mark Rafn dagon@... <http://www.dagon.net/>
>
>
>
>This list is basically unmoderated. However abusive language will not be
tolerated
>
>
